Container.Name: Hearchco - Agent
Container.Overview: Hearchco is a distributed and fast metasearch engine that respects your privacy.
Container.Category: Network:Privacy Security: Cloud: Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: Google search DuckDuckGo privacy Bing SearchXNG Hearchco LibreY LibreX araa
Container.Requires: This is the agent/backend for the Hearchco metasearch engine. It requires a frontend to also be running. [br] This application requires a separate Redis database.

Config.Name: Application Port
Config.Description: Port over which the frontend will communicate with this backend

Config.Name: Frontend URLs
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of frontend URLs that are allowed to communicate with this backend. Replace with IP:PORT or domain of your frontend

Config.Name: Image Proxy Secret Key
Config.Description: Secret key used for hashing image URLs in the image proxy. Should be at least 32 characters long.

Config.Name: Cache Type
Config.Description: Type of cache to use. Not recommended to change.
